page.title: 10Transport.
page.content:
{ The only public transport from Biggin is the{bus to Ashbourne.}It only operates on{Thursdays and {Saturdays.
Apart from that people have their own transport: cars, mopeds, vans and bikes.
Children from the outlying houses and farms come to{Biggin School}by {taxi.
Children who attend Queen Elizabeth Grammar School in Ashbourne go by a {school bus}service about 8.15 am.
At one time the train came through Biggin but the line was closed and it is now the{Tissington Trail}for walking cycling and pony trekking.
